text: Mercyful Fate are a heavy metal band from Denmark. The band was formed in Copenhagen in 1980. ==Members== ===Current members=== * King Diamond - vocals, keyboard (1981–1985, 1992–present) * Hank Shermann - guitar (1981–1985, 1992–present) * Mike Wead - guitar (1996–present) * Bjarne T. Holm - drums (1994–present) * Sharlee D'Angelo - bass (1993–present) ===Former members=== * Michael Denner - guitar (1981, 1982–1985, 1992–1996) * Timi Hansen - bass (1981–1985, 1992–1993) * Kim Ruzz - drums (1981–1985) * Tommie "Snowy Shaw" Helgesson - drums (1993–1994) ===Session members=== * Lars Ulrich - drums (1993) * Old Nick - drums (1981) * Morten Nielson - drums (1993) ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== * Melissa (1983) * Don't Break the Oath (1984) * In the Shadows (1993) * Time (1994) * Into the Unknown (1996) * Dead Again (1998) * 9 (1999) ===Compilation albums=== * The Beginning (1987) * Return of the Vampire (1992) * A Dangerous Meeting (1992) * The Best of Mercyful Fate (2003) ===Extended plays=== * The Mercyful Fate EP (1982) * The Bell Witch (1994) ==References== == Other websites == *Official Website Category:1980 establishments in Europe Category:1980s establishments in Denmark Category:Black metal bands Category:Danish heavy metal bands Category:Musical groups from Copenhagen Category:Musical groups established in 1980
